Verses: 1 dhaaveedhu Kizhavanum Poorana Vayadhullavanumaanapodhu, Than Kumaaranaagiya Saalomonai Isravelinmel Raajaavaakkinaan.
2 isravelin Ellaap Prabukkalaiyum, Aasaariyaraiyum, Leviyaraiyum Koodivarumpadi Seydhaan.
3 appozhudhu Muppadhu Vayadhumudhal Adharku Merpatta Leviyar Perperaaga Ennappattaargal, Thalaithalaiyaaga Ennappatta Avargaludaiya Lakkam Muppaththennaayiram.
4 avargalil Irubaththunaalaayiramper Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Velaiyai Visaarikkiravargalum, Aaraayiramper Thalaivarum Maniyakaararumaayirukkavendum Endrum,

5 naalaayiramper Vaasal Kaakkiravargalaayirukkavendum Endrum, Thudhiseygiradharkuth Thaan Pannuviththa Keedhavaaththiyangalaal Naalaayiramper Karththaraith Thudhikkiravargalaayirukkavendum Endrum Dhaaveedhu Solli,
6 avargalai Leviyin Kumaararaagiya Kerson, Kogaadh, Meraari Enbavargaludaiya Vaguppugalinpadi Vaguththaan.
7 kersoniyaril, Laadhaanum, Simeyum Irundhaargal.
8 laadhaanin Kumaarar, Yegiyel, Seththaam, Yovel Ennum Moondruper; Ivargalil Mundhinavan Thalaimaiyaayirundhaan.
9 simeyin Kumaarar, Selomidh, Aasiyel, Aaraan Ennum Moondruper; Ivargal Laadhaan Vamsap Pidhaakkalil Thalaimaiyaayirundhaargal.
10 yaagaadh, Seenaa, Eyoosh, Pereeyaa Ennum Naaluperum Simeyin Kumaararaayirundhaargal.

11 yaagaath Thalaimaiyaayirundhaan; Seenaa Irandaam Kumaaranaayirundhaan; Eyooshukkum Pereeyaavukkum Anegam Kumaarar Iraadhapadiyinaal, Avargal Pidhaakkalin Kudumbaththaaril Ore Vamsamaaga Ennappattaargal.
12 kokaaththin Kumaarar Amraam, Idhsaar, Epron, Oosiyel Ennum Naaluper.

13 amraamin Kumaarar, Aaron, Mose Enbavargal; Aaronum Avan Kumaararum Parisuththaththirkup Parisuththamaana Sthalaththai Endraikkum Parisuththamaaik Kaakkiradharkum, Endraikkum Karththarukku Munbaaga Thoobankaattugiradharkum, Avarukku Aaraadhanai Seygiradharkum, Avar Naamaththile Aaseervaadham Kodukkiradharkum Piriththuvaikkappattaargal.
14 dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Moseyin Kumaararovenil, Levikoththiraththaarukkul Ennappattaargal.
15 moseyin Kumaarar, Kersom, Eliyesar Enbavargal.
16 kersomin Kumaararil Sebuvel Thalaimaiyaayirundhaan.
17 eliyesarudaiya Kumaararil Regabiyaa Ennum Avan Kumaaran Thalaimaiyaayirundhaan: Eliyesarukku Vere Kumaarar Illai, Regabiyaavin Kumaarar Anegaraayirundhaargal.
18 idhserin Kumaararil Selomith Thalaimaiyaayirundhaan.
19 epronin Kumaararil Eriyaa Enbavan Thalaimaiyaayirundhaan; Irandaavadhu Amariyaa, Moondraavadhu Yaagaasiyel Naalaavadhu Ekkaamiyaam.
20 oosiyelin Kumaararil Meegaa Enbavan Thalaimaiyaayirundhaan; Irandaavadhu Ishiyaa.
21 meraariyin Kumaarar, Mageli, Moosi Enbavargal; Mageliyin Kumaarar, Eleyaasaar, Kees Enbavargal.
22 eleyaasaar Marikkirapodhu, Avanukkuk Kumaaraththigale Allaamal Kumaarar Illai; Keesin Kumaararaagiya Ivargaludaiya Sagodharar Ivargalai Vivaagampanninaargal.
23 moosiyin Kumaarar, Magali, Edher, Eremodh Ennum Moondruper.

24 thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Kudumbangalinpadiye, Pidhaakkalil Thalaimaiyaayirundha Levi Puththirarin Pertaappinpadiye, Thalaithalaiyaaga Ennappatta Irubadhu Vayadhumudhal Adharku Merpatta Ivargaludaiya Sandhadhiyaar Karththarudaiya Aalayaththup Panividaiyai Seydhaargal.
25 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Thamadhu Janaththai Ilaippaariyirukkappanninaar; Avar Endrendraikkum Erusalemil Vaasampannuvaarendrum,
26 ini Leviyar Vaasasthalaththaiyaagilum Adhin Oozhiyaththirkaduththa Adhin Panimuttugalil Edhaiyaagilum Sumakkaththevaiyillai Endrum,
27 dhaaveedhu Avargalaik Kuriththuchchonna Kadaisi Vaarththaigalinpadiye, Levi Puththiraril Thogaikkutpattavargal Irubadhuvayadhumudhal Adharku Merpattavargalaayirundhaargal.

28 avargal Aaronudaiya Kumaararin Keezhk Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Oozhiyamaai Nindru, Praagaarangalaiyum, Araigalaiyum, Sagala Parisuththa Panimuttugalin Suththigarippaiyum, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Aaraadhanaikkaduththa Velaiyaiyum Visaarippadhum,
29 samugaththappangalaiyum, Pojanapalikku Melliya Maavaiyum, Pulippillaadha Adhirasangalaiyum, Sattigalile Seygiradhaiyum Sudugiradhaiyum, Thittamaana Sagala Niraiyaiyum Alavaiyum Visaarippadhum,

30 naaldhorum Kaalaiyilum Maalaiyilum Karththaraip Potrith Thudhiththu, Oivunaatkalilum, Amaavaasaigalilum, Pandigaigalilum, Karththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganapaligal Seluththappadugira Sagala Velaigalilum,
31 lakkaththirkullaana Avargal Thangalukku Niyamikkappattapadiye, Eppozhudhum Andhap Pragaaramaai Seyya, Karththarukku Munbaaga Nirpadhum,

32 aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Kaavalaiyum Parisuththa Sthalaththin Kaavalaiyum Thangal Sagodhararaagiya Aaronudaiya Kumaararin Kaavalaiyum Kaappadhum, Karththarudaiyaaalayaththin Panividaiyai Seyvadhum Avargal Velaiyaayirundhadhu.
